alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gallatin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:32AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN RIPLEY, SOUTHERN DEARBORN, SWITZERLAND, CARROLL AND WESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 400 AM EDT... At 332 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Madison, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Aurora, Rising Sun, Vevay, Warsaw, Dillsboro, Florence, Kentucky Speedway, Pleasant, French, Hartford, Fairview, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Worthville, Prestonville, Center Square, Braytown and Aberdeen. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 39 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
